Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 128th overall pick, by California in 1966...
Injured on 7/9/1966 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/28/1972, off Al Santorini (CHW)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $940,000 per year...
